guides.name: 如何得知我的作業系統?

hardware.title: 硬體
hardware.enquiry:
如果你室友的網路可以用，試試看把他的電腦插上你座位的網路孔。
結果如何？

cabelOrSocket.title: 檢查網路線
cabelOrSocket.enquiry:
如果你室友的網路可以用，試試看網路線有沒有作用。
結果如何？

cableBroken.title: 我們覺得你的線壞掉了

computerHardware.title: 硬體問題
computerHardware.enquiry: 你電腦的硬體怪怪的，造成一些無法預測的問題…

ip.title: 你的IP是什麼?
ip.enquiry: ( XX 代表 2~255 之間的數字，請不要怕 )

registerGuide.title: 註冊
registerGuide.enquiry: When you are in your room, using the dorm wired network, see if you can open the dorm network registration page. If you can, complete the registration process, and wait for 5~10 minutes. Can you connect to the internet now?

situation.answer: 我註冊好了！而且網路可以動了！
註冊網頁可以開，但是它不讓我註冊。
註冊網頁可以開，但我覺得怪怪的。
我已經註冊，但是還是不能用網路……
我連註冊網頁都開不起來。

dhcp.title: DHCP 設定
dhcp.enquiry: 確認你有開啟 DHCP. 如果沒有，請將之開啟，並靜候一到五分鐘。

guides.name: 怎麼知道我是否已開啟 DHCP ?
怎麼知道我的 IP 是什麼?

situation.answer:
DHCP 已開啟, 卻仍無法連上網路。
我的 IP 是 140.112.XX.XX

DHCP 已開啟, 卻仍無法連上網路。
我的 IP 是 192.168.XX.XX
DHCP 已開啟, 也連上網路了！
對不起，我真的不知道你在講什麼…

block.title: IP 被鎖？
block.enquiry:
請查看此頁面
這個頁面也可以。
上面有沒有你的學號？

situation.answer: 嗯～我赫然發現自己暴於其中…

renew.title: DHCP renew
renew.enquiry: Can you manually make your computer renew network configuration using DHCP?

guides.name: How to make my computer renew IP using DHCP?

situation.answer: After I try many times, I still can not connect to the internet.
I can not understand how to do that.
This step fix solve my problem!!

setIP.title: Manually set your IP
setIP.enquiry: Go to registration page to see what IP you should use. Then manually set your computer's IP accrodingly.

guides.name: How to know the IP I should use?
How to set my computer's IP?

situation.answer: I successfully connect to the internet.
I can not understand how to do that.

scan.title: Scan your computer.

guides.name: How to download a anti-virus software from NTU computer center?

scan.enquiry: Install one anti-virus software and scan your computer. If you don't have anti-virus software, you can download one from NTU computer center. After you find out and remove the virus, please contact the network management assistant. ( If you are blocked many time, the network management assistant may suggest that you reinstall the operation system of your computer. )

slowSpeed.title: Slow Network Speed
slowSpeed.enquiry: Go to the ntu network speed test page to test your network speed.

situation.answer: It tells me that my download speed is > 8 mbps
It tells me that my download speed is < 8 mbps

lanSpeed.title: Campus Low Speed
lanSpeed.enquiry: Something seems to go wrong. If the network keep slow, please contact your dorm network management assistant.

situation.answer: Contact the dorm network management  assistant.
It tells me that my download speed is > 8 mbps
It tells me that my download speed is < 8 mbps

dns.title: DNS Setting
dns.enquiry: Your problem may be result from improper DNS settings. Try to set DNS lookup server to be 140.112.254.4 and 8.8.8.8.

situation.answer:
The problem persist for a long time.
Network management assistant may be helpful.
